records.location_details: A group of individuals was detected less than 1.5 kilometers from the Serbian border, near the Serbian-Bulgarian border. They reported being beaten by Serbian police.
records.location_text_raw: less than 1,5 kilometer from the Serbian border

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman or degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights
Article 4 Protocol No 4 to the European Convention on Human Rights

records.context_note: The Fundamental Rights Office concludes it is likely that a group of four individuals was apprehended in Serbia by Serbian police, ill-treated, and had their money taken. It is further considered possible that the group was collectively expelled to Bulgaria.
records.evidence_quote: The Fundamental Rights Office concludes as likely that a group of four individuals was apprehended in Serbia by the Serbian police, and subsequently ill-treated and had their money taken.
